name: Ants!
description:
dig a hole near some food and burrow a large enough cave to morph into a queen

select ants and move them to gather food

push the food back to the queen to receive a stat bonus 

amass an army and take on the opposing ant team

'p' to play and pause

'r' to restart when the game is over

click to select and move

'd' to dig a hole

's' to spit venom

double click to show stats

shift + click to select or deselect multiple

shift + 'a' to add all on current layer to group

esc to close stats/deselect group/and deselect

ctrl + '+' or '-' to change level

 ctrl + shift + arrow keys to scroll map

space to cycle selection and cycle through group
